data.name: HELP ME!
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GAMES...

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493430/Agony_Lords_of_Hell/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/946920/PARANOID/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493440/TORMENTOR/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1803150/Void_Slayer/


About the Game


Help me! This is a story-driven first-person horror game with stealth elements and puzzles.
The main character Maxim tries to find his missing father, and the only connection with his disappearance are the mysterious nightmares that have haunted him for a long time.
But the more family secrets that have been hidden for years are unraveled, the more the line between dreams and reality becomes blurred.

The game is set in Russia, Moscow (present time). The unusual setting is made in realistic graphics using technologies such as photogrammetry, and the interactive environment allows you to explore the world of the game more.

data.short_description: Help me! This is a story-driven first-person horror game where you are going to unravel family secrets as you move between reality and nightmares.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 (2.8 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 7 1800X (3.6 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 (2.8 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 7 1800X (3.6 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore
